text: The Obama family is a political family based in the United States, who have been active in American politics, public service, law, activism, education and have held many political offices and roles in the state and federal government of the United States. The Obama's were the first family of the United States from 2009 to 2017, when Barack Obama was the 44th president of the United States. Category:Barack Obama Category:American families
title: Family of Barack Obama
